page.description: Adds two numbers (defined as character strings) together.
page.prototype: .Add as C (one as C, two as C)

argument.name: one
argument.description: The first number to add, defined as a character string.

argument.name: two
argument.description: The second number to add, defined as a character string.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the sum of the two values as a character string.
